more_content:
Labor Day weekend is upon us! Here’s a look at the best activities to look forward to during this long weekend.

Key West Brewfest

Aug. 29-Sept. 2, various locations in Key West
It’s the 10th year of the craft beer festival that is Brewfest, featuring pool parties, food pairings, tasting festivals and live music. Catch one of many events through Aug. 29-Sept. 2, with the main event – the tasting festival – set for Saturday, Aug. 31. For details, read more.

Reality is a Drag Show

Sept. 2 at Aqua Bar & Nightclub
Join queens Faith, Beatrix and Elle at 9pm for a raucous end to the weekend! Expect a fun, hilarious show that attracts a diverse audience for a night of delicious drinks and light-heartedness. Reserve your table in advance.

Seafood Lover's Tasting & Cultural Walking Tour

Aug. 30, Old Town, Key West
Take a break from beer with a walking tour that covers six local restaurants in Old Town with a focus on seafood. You’ll discover hidden gems and get a history lesson in the process! Reserve tickets ahead of time and check available dates.

Shastina Chiles at The Green Room

 

Sept. 2 at The Green Room
This young, singer-songwriter defies musical genres with a unique blend of pop and r&b. Backed with powerful vocals, Shastina is an awesome act to catch around the island. See her perform at 4pm at The Green Room this Labor Day.

Scavenger Hunt Adventure

Sept. 2, starts at Flagler Station Museum
Guided by a smartphone, teams solve clues and complete challenges while discovering Key West! This is a fun activity for the family. Start when you’d like and play at your own pace between 9am to 8pm on Labor Day. See how to play.

 

Book for your final trip of the summer! Enjoy deals just for being a Floridian

That’s right! Take advantage of the Florida Residents Escape package at 24 North Hotel in Key West. We have awesome amenities that set us apart from the rest, such as hourly shuttle service to Mallory Square in Old Town. We also have a Starbucks on site, as well as an awesome pool area, lounge, poolside restaurant, and clean, comfortable rooms.

Check out our rooms here, and look to see which of our online specials work for you.
title: Labor Day Weekend Picks
